text: Kazimieras Motieka (12 November 1929 â€“ 31 August 2021) was a Lithuanian politician and lawyer. In 1990 he was among those who signed the Act of the Re-Establishment of the State of Lithuania. He was born in Vilnius, Lithuania. Motieka died on August 31, 2021 in Vilnius at the age of 92. == References == Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:European lawyers Category:Politicians from Vilnius
title: Kazimieras Motieka
